prayers.section: KO E NGAAHI KOLE ‘OKU TOUTOU LAU ‘E HE KĀINGALOTÚ
prayers.text: ‘Oku ou tui ki he ‘Otuá koe Tamai māfimafi, ‘a ē na’á ne fakatupu ‘a e langí mo māmaní. Pea ‘oku ou tui kia Sēsū Kilistō, ko hono ‘Alo pē ‘e taha, ko tohau ‘Eikí; ‘a ē na’e tupu-tangata ‘i he ngāue pē ‘a e Laumālie Mā’oni’oní, pea ‘alo’i ia ‘e he Tāupo’ou ko Maliá, peá ne mamahi ia ‘i he pule ‘a Ponitō Pailató; na’e kalusefai foki ia ‘o pekia, pea telio, pea hā’ele hifo ia ki he kau maté, pea tu’u ia ‘i hono ‘aho tolu mei he pekiá, pea hā’ele hake ia ki Hēvani, ‘o ‘afio ‘i he to’omata’u ‘o e ‘Otua ko e Tamai māfimafi, pea ‘e toki hā’ele mai mei ai, ke fakamaau’i ‘a e mo’uí mo e maté. Pea ‘oku ou tui foki ki he Laumālie Mā’oni’oní, mo e Sanagata ‘Ekelesia Katoliká, mo e feohi ‘a e kakai angatonú, mo e fakamolemole ‘o e angahalá, mo e tu’u hake ‘a e sinó pea mo e mo’ui ta’engatá. ‘Āmeni.
